javadoc: The FunctionRepeatableCommentFieldLocation class provides specific information about the Function Repeatable Comment field within a program location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: locationAddr
params.comment: the address of the listing location (i.e., referent code unit)

params.name: comment
params.comment: the function comment array String at this location.

params.name: row
params.comment: row number (index into the comment array)

params.name: charOffset
params.comment: character position within the comment, indexed by row

methods.name: <init>

params.name: functionAddr
params.comment: the function address (must not be an EXTERNAL function)

params.name: comment
params.comment: the function comment array String at this location.

params.name: row
params.comment: row number (index into the comment array)

params.name: col
params.comment: character position within the comment, indexed by row

methods.javadoc: Return the function comment string at this location.

methods.comment: Return the function comment string at this location.

name: FunctionRepeatableCommentFieldLocation
comment:
The FunctionRepeatableCommentFieldLocation class provides specific information
 about the Function Repeatable Comment field within a program location.
